item.title: Hint
item.description: Background Apache ShardingSphere uses ThreadLocal to manage sharding key values for mandatory routing. A sharding value can be added by programming to the HintManager that takes effect only within the current thread. Apache ShardingSphere can also do mandatory routing by adding comments to SQL. Main application scenarios for Hint: The sharding fields do not exist in the SQL and database table structure but in the external business logic. Certain data operations are forced to be performed in given databases.
